name: glcheck
description: A testing framework for WebGL 1 and 2 applications

scripts.test: npm run lint && ./glcheck && npm run test-full-config && npm run test-cli-args && npm run test-cli-equal-args
scripts.test-full-config: ./glcheck --config test/test-configs/full-config.json && test -d full-config-results  && test -d .nyc_output && rimraf full-config-results
scripts.test-cli-args: ./glcheck --clear-config --output-dir cli-results --server-port 5151 --asset-dir test/assets/ --coverage true, --headless true test/test.js && test -d cli-results  && test -d .nyc_output && rimraf cli-results
scripts.test-cli-equal-args: ./glcheck --clear-config --output-dir=cli-equal-results --server-port=5151 --asset-dir=test/assets/ --coverage=true --headless=true test/test.js && test -d cli-equal-results  && test -d .nyc_output && rimraf cli-equal-results
